entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
